answers.answer: Did you sleep on them? Do you have any spots in your eyes or any swelling in your face? What's your BP usually?
Check your blood pressure, could be a sign of prrecylamsia, or could jus be more joys of pregnancy. But i think its definitely a reason you need to call your dr asap. Its always best to be safe.
My blood pressure is always normal and no swelling in my face nothing just my hands I feel fine . What isit
Maybe your not drinking enough water. Try relaxing,  elevate your feet and arms and lay down for a bit. See if it goes away.

It could be extra fluid. But kaysie03 said it is also a sign of preeclampsia. My feet were the first to swell in my second trimester, then my hands and my face swelled much later on. Only then did the doc test me, but I probably had issues starting around the time my hands swelled and he should have put me on bed rest(i was told this by a second Dr in my second pregnancy). Let your doc know.
Not always a sign of PreE but talking with your doc and doing a simple urine test to check for protein can give you a definitive answer.  Good luck
Ive got the same hun and swollen feet can hardly walk doc said it was normal :(
Had the same thing happen my last week of pregnancy.. You should be fine, just try to stat away from salt :)

question: My due dates in 6 days and my hands just swelled up. My fingers not usual size should I worry !!!!
title: Should I worry
